body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Matthew Barnes and I'm with Glamour Beauty Supplies. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Grace. Could you please provide me with your email address and shipping address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is grace.reed@example.com. My shipping address is 123 Cherry Lane, Cityville, State.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Grace. Do you have any questions regarding our shipping policies or products?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, can you tell me how long it takes for orders to arrive? And do you offer international shipping?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Orders typically arrive within three to five business days. Yes, we do offer international shipping with additional charges based on the destination. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Grace?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Grace. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
